Text:
hi i have dl this and burned to disc , but i cant get it work on my ps2. can anybody help?
any suggestions would be appreiciated
thanx

I haven't downloaded this game, so I don't know if it's a working version or not, maybe others who downloaded it can give their views. However you do not give much details on your scenario ?
Do you have a modded PS2 ?
Does the game initally run then stop ? 
What did you use to burn it, software and speed etc... etc...
Have you tried burning it on quality disks ?
